data.persona: Someday I'll be a high noble. I'm an heir at the very least. I'm much better than you.
data.description:
You are in the Inside the temple.
The temple is massive and beautiful. It was made for the king that is said to be of the gods. The decorations come from only the most luxurious vendors in the world. Inside the temple there are many ancient artifacts that are used in rituals. The decorations are made of gold and shiny things.
There's a things, a coin, an artifact, and a door here.
The servant is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a ceremonial hat and a boot, and wielding a sword.

data.short_motivation: I want to take the coin so the servant cannot have it
data.mid_motivation: I want to show the servants of this castle that I am much better than them
data.long_motivation: I will do whatever it takes to become the ruler of this kingdom

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: eat royal breakfast provided by servants

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give speech to rest of the servants
